name: RedShip
description:
If the universe is infinite, why are the Red Federation ships looping in an endless minefield?

Use your wits and brace yourself for a difficult journey ahead of you. Your story will end with the destruction of your ship, but be proud and progress as far as you can. Match colors to unlock weapons and upgrades. Negate bombs and other obstacles found in your travel. Save planets from alien invasion to gain an extra life. Build your ship from the ground up, fly to space, destroy pirate ships, survive an asteroid belt, annihilate Alien Motherships, and fly through an infinite minefield full of bad surprises.

Be the best space pilot you know you can be!!!

- Multi-levels of difficulty
- Missions mode
- Arcade mode
- Unlock powerful updates
- Charge your batteries with matches and discharge them at the right time
- Match 5-in-a-row to get a new weapon
- Different goals for each mission
- A wide variety of negative tiles
- Build your ship
- Reach space
- Traverse an asteroid belt
- Kill alien pirates
- Destroy alien mothership
- Infinite travel through a space minefield
